tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Anupam,is very professional in,his approach. i needed 5 implants in my jaw which were done by him. Right from the beginning he put me at ese and explaned the entire procedure to me in detail alog eith the charges . He had already put me on some anxiety medicine before i came to the clinic as i am very scared of dental treatment . Everythimg worked as clockwork and the procedure was completed in one and a half hours as planned. i have previously got two other dental implants so i now the difference in approch and the comfort levels. would reommend him to others for sure .also he had great jazz  music playing at the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Anupam Is the most amazing dentist I have come across and trust its been more than a decade that i have been visiting dentists. After meeting him i think i have found one for life. My implant needed fixing as i was about to get married in 2 months. He understood my situation and went out of the way to make it work. The most friendly doctor i have met. He knows his job very well. Even if my tooth aches now i go all the to his clinic rather than letting any other doctor even look at it.Would recommend him without any second thoughts.

I have been visited to many dental clinics but  I couldn't start my treatment coz I was discomfort, scared n I have been always told getting done braces, implants r very painful...  then I started searching in google thr I found Dr Anupam n Dr Natalia both of them are very polite n professional.. n thank so much Dr Anupam for giving me such a painless treatment both braces n implant. I love to visit thr n I will highly recommend to everyone.. :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Anupam is qualified and experienced Orthodontist. I went to him with a crooked front teeth which was fixed with braces. It took 2 years which was a bit longer than he anticipated but my teeth were aligned perfectly. I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for a Orthodontic treatment.

I don't normally write any review for any doctor on any public forum, however this experience of mine with Dr. Anupam Sinha calls for one. Though the doctor was very friendly, I had some issues with the way I was treated. 

I visited Dr. Natalia for the first time in this clinic because of some recurring pain in one of my pre-molars. On diagnosis, she advised me to get RCT done. The next time I came after taking her appointment on Practo, I was seen by Dr. Anupam. Though he was not the doctor that I had intended to be treated by (since I had talked to Dr Natalia), I did not object and went ahead with him. 

The first sitting went quite well, almost painless. However, the second sitting was a NIGHTMARE. I was already having slight pain and had informed Dr Anupam about it before the procedure itself. He straight away started with his thing and in spite of telling him MULTIPLE times during the procedure about the pain, that kept aggravating, he did very little to subside it. I could feel some resistance from his side in giving me proper local anaesthesia, for reasons that I am not aware of and are obviously, beyond my reasoning. Orion advertises "painless RCT" in their prescriptions, but this sitting was completely opposite. That night I had unbearable pain in that tooth and had to take THREE pain killers to sleep - Ketrorl, Enzoflam and Ultracet.

After getting a tooth-dressing done by him again the next day, I met him for the fourth and the last time after a gap of 5-6 days. To my surprise, this again was a NIGHTMARE, ****** *** ** ***** ************ ** *** ******* Needless to state, I felt quite some pain during the whole procedure, however, the icing on the cake was when the doctor BURNT my lower lip with a heated needle. Yes you read that right! While oxidizing the tooth, ** ****** *** *** *** *** ** *** ******* *** ******* **** ** *** **** ***** *** *** ****** **** *** ****** **** ****** ** *** **** **** **** **** ****** *** ******* ** ** ***** **** Though it was momentary, it happened TWICE, and I screamed on both these instances at the top of my voice, however, all he said was "just about to get over sir, bear with me for a couple of more minutes". The second time when he burnt my lip, I had to shove his hand off and then tell him that he had burnt my lower lip, and it was NOT the pain in my tooth, but the BURN that I had been screaming out loud for.

On completion, he put some Vaseline on the lip and told me that the RCT is done. He had taken 5k from me *** **** ****** **** without the cap (which I was not even told by him that it has to be ultimately put).

Had a very bad experience with this doctor, will never recommend him to anyone. I had gone to Orion, thinking that it was in GK1 and had good ratings, *** ** *** ******* *** * ******* ****** **** ** ********* *******
reply_text:
Dear sir ,
You did in fact make an appointment with Dr Natalia and you were met by her and asked to start root canal treatment . You wanted time to think about it. Sunsequently after a few days when you did get in touch to start treatment dr Natalia had some personal work and asked you if you were ok getting treatment done with another dr before you came for the appointment .It was after your telephonic consent before coming for the appointment that Dr Anupam was assigned for your work.The charges for the root canal was explained to you before starting as Rs 5000 by dr Natalia .. Sometimes during endodontic treatment a flare up can occur especially as it did in you case and as you called up late in the night complaining of pain which wasn't subsiding with regular pain killers and so a more effective one was prescribed so that you could have a restful sleep and you were called for a check up early next morning. Subsequent to this episode the rct was compleated well over the next 2 visits.I hope you understand that due to the Corona virus doctors have to work with a variety of PPE to prevent cross infection . Dr anupam was using a hot instrument in your tooth and it touched your lip inadvertently while working in your mouth with all the PPE and mask. He did apologize for that . It was not intentional . 
Subsequent to the completion of the rct you informed us 3 days later that your tooth was now doing well and had healed and you were ready to make an appointment for the crown. You asked about our crown charges and were again  informed of the charges 7500 rs. After this you decided to write us a bad review. You never communicated your disappointments to us. Charge for the crown after paying for the root canal is normal . We  assure you that these rates are quite standard for the said procedures anywhere in South delhi.
We are sorry that you had an unpleasant experience with your dental procedure we would endeavour to improve our services further.

review: I usually don’t leave a negative review, but this doctor deserves one because of the overconfidence or attitude he keeps. On the very first day during my orthodontic consultation he grinded my teeth to shape it, understood – he wanted to make them look better but that made me very vary of him ******* * ******** ** *** * **** **** *** **** ***** I’m very scared of dentists and it’s my right to question what they are doing and tell them what I feel comfortable with but this doctor is never in mood to listen , even with slightest of concern , he would get angry and behave very rude. I always tried to ignore his rudeness thinking he is a good doctor but I was so wrong. With every visit he grew more troublesome and created an atmosphere that would make impossible to even stand in his clinic. Since I had to leave country in sometimes, I choose to ignore it to save myself from finding another doctor. It was not until my braces were removed and fixed retainers were put, I realized this doctor is not as good as I had assumed. For the first time he put the retainers, it irritated me a lot , I touched it to see whats bothering and  within a day it came out in my hand .I went to him second time I told him something is not right, because the retainers irritate me a lot which is not usual, I did ask to pull up my front two teeth together so retainers won’t hurt (maybe a wrong way to say ) and he didn’t budge in either, but something was clearly wrong. My teeth would have burning sensation every night and gums started to bleed. I did check it in two way mirror found my gums were so swollen, I resisted to see if I could correct it with oral medications or antiseptic mouth wash ( I was out of india already) but nothing worked , one night I just  couldn’t take it longer, and straight away rushed to dentist to remove the fixed retainers.  He informed me that retainers caused inflammation and receding gums problem. The orthodontist had put the retainers right over my gums. It was a bad decision to stay with this doctor, and of course even the best of the best doctor can stoop low to charge you money if he knows you are in emergency.  *** **** ** **** ***** **** ***** ** ***** ** *** ******** *** ******* **** **** ********* *** *** ******* ** *** ****** **** ***** ******* *** ******* ***** ** ** ***** *** ******* * ******* **** *** ****** *** ****** ****** **** ****** ** ***** ***** A very bad experience overall with them.
reply_text:
Dear Manisha, 
After pondering over it for a very long time i have decided to respond to your review. I did not deem it correct to do this over a public forum, but every time I go through it, it bothers me. You left a few facts out which I would like to bring to your notice again. 
1) You were getting treatment done somewhere else and transferred midway because you said your treatment was not going progressing well and was not getting finished even though it was more than  a year and a half 
2) You were quoted the treatment cost at the beginning of the treatment cost and all charges were explained and no extra money was charged to you over and above the said quoted amount. 
3 ) We finished your treatment in the time frame set for you as you were supposed to relocate to Canada/U.S  . 
4) The only problem we had was that you wanted me to reduce the size of your teeth and bring them closer together which was not a healthy option and you were informed about the same. You offered us more money to do that but I refused it was not the healthy option as per my education and experience.
 You were told by me that money is not the driving force and that it was unhealthy. You would always sit in the dental chair and argue with me asking the same thing over and over that why your teeth cannot be shaved parallel and the teeth bought close together. 
You were told that if you want that done you will need to go to some other dentist but you would come and sit outside my clinic crying and saying you do not want to go to anyone else as you want to get treatment done here.
5)  You started coming here to the clinic without making appointment and expecting to be seen . 
6) You started to whatsapp me on the phone and expected me to answer attend to your queries even late in the night when I could not you started getting upset with me . 
7) After your treatment was over you started coming to the clinic asking me to continue the treatment which was not needed.  
8) You choose to get a fixed retainer which needs to be cleaned regularly. If not brushed properly it leads to gum inflammation. In such instances the gum can get inflamed and grow over the retainer. 
9) Your treatment was completed to the best standards. 
I know that it’s not humanly possible to please all patients although we strive to do that. Sometimes we cannot do it because some patients do not understand that there is a difference between a doctor and other areas where customer is king and you do as the customer asks you to do. A doctor cannot always do what you want done as in the long run it may not be the healthy option. I would also like to state that you were never taken advantage of in anyway whether monetarily or otherwise. In fact we feel quite let down by your response.

review:
The doctor didn't explain why I would need braces. Made me wonder if braces are one of the most profitable things for dentists to recommend. 
He seemed more interested in convincing me to get braces although the situation was that I really didn't need it (as I confirmed with other doctors later). 

He isn't worth the high consultation fees. Moreover, even his charges for doing RCTs are almost double of what other doctors with similar qualification charge. Not sure why would anyone consider him. 

I would never recommend anyone to see Dr Anupam. Didn't have a pleasant experience.

I was there for follow up check. He checked. Briefed.All ok.
I had tooth issue. Extracted two months back. Now implantation has to happen.forst part done. Both Dr Natalia and Dr ANUPAM are very professional and good human being. They care for patients.

Excellent service. A big thank you for making my teeth look beautiful. Dr anupam explained the treatment process to me and I was always very comfortable during the procedure . I would recommend him to everyone seeking orthodontic treatment. The clinic is very nice and bright and the music makes the patient sitting in the chair very comfortable.
reply_text: Thanks for taking the time out for the review.

review: I received treatment from Dr Anupam and Dr Natalia. I was incredibly impressed with their can do approach and empathetic patient management. I surrendered to their expertise and advice because I can confidently say they are top of their game. I have already recommended them to family and friends. They have an eye for detail which means you'll have nothing less than perfect.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Great attitude towards patients. Very experienced. ***** ** ********** ** *** ********** Highly recommend anyone with dental problem to visit Orion Orthodontic and Dental Care Center. Very content with my treatment.

I recently got deep cleaning of my teeth and gums from Doctor Anupam. I have a phobia of dentists but Dr Anupam has a very gentle hand. He keeps reassuring me during the procedure. He stopped when I asked him to and generally made me very comfortable in the dental chair. I have visited other dentists abroad including the USA and EU but have yet to experience such personalised attention anywhere. The clinic is well equipped and I would like to make a special mention of the anesthesia process that they give here. Dr Anupam uses a special anaesthesia delivery system that makes the process absolutely painless. one does not even feel the injection. The ambience of his clinic is very relaxing. I would recommend him highly for dental treatment.

Very good experience...dr anupam sinha is doing very well..he is very comforting and nice...I have started my orthodontic treatment 2 months ago. Since it's a very long procedure so I hope that I ll get a wonderful smile

review: I have anxiety issues so undergoing any procedure is scary. I was asking for sedation but the doctors extracted the tooth under local anaesthesia. Even after 6 odd hours, there is minimal discomfort.
Very nice doctor! Helpful and intelligent. He knows exactly what he is doing and rest assures you are in safe hands.

Excellent. Dr. Sinha is well versed with dental surgery treatments. Dr. Natalia and Dr. Anupam makes a wonderful dentist couple who emphasizes on developing cordial relations with patients apart from efficiently treating them :)

I visted along-with my daughter for her braces. It was a nice experience with Dr. Anupam he is friendly and a thorough professional. I will always recommend my friends and Relatives to visit Orion for their dental problems.
Excellent! Very professional. The work was done efficiently. I would recommend Dr. Anupam to everyone.
Dr . Anupam Sinha is one of the best dental doctor I have come across. Excellent service with amazing results. I would recommend him to people looking for genuine advice and good results.
Very good dental care center. I am very happy with the doctor and treatment I got done. Great doctor.
The doc saw me after his clinic hours and relieved me of the worst pain ever. Thank you, I am very grateful
Lovely music, awesome coffee and a very homely and pleasant feel to this dental centre. Very comfortable
Very comfortable place for all teeth problems. I have 2 dental implants done by Dr Sinha. He is very soft spoken and competent doc.

My experience with the said doctor is very good. He is very practical and understand the patients problems and works seriously to the satisfaction of the patient. He is cool and knows his job very well.

Couldn't  be better, Dr Anupam has been instrumental in erasing so called a Fear Of Dental Chair.
Awesome experience on every visit.

Dr Anupam  is very  gentile and well experinced  always in smily face and helpful lathe time available very easy to contact and reply is very fast I can not forget hole life what he did for my mom  and still he is dedicated for my father and hole family I always have reads for him and his wife s he is also very co operative and gentile
